item.title: @elonmusk: Last month, Apple News posted ZERO articles by right-leaning outlets and more than 400 by left-leani...
item.description: Last month, Apple News posted ZERO articles by right-leaning outlets and more than 400 by left-leaning outlets. I sent a letter to CEO Tim Cook demanding answers and all internal data about the distribution of articles on the platform over the last year.

item.description: Elon Muskâ€™s Starlink is banned in South Africa, not for technical reasons, but simply because Elon isnâ€™t Black. Absolutely disgraceful "If I were Black, Starlink would have received a license to operate years ago" -Elon Musk

item.title: @elonmusk: There really is no better place than X to share and debate deeply technical analysis. Particularly o...
item.description: There really is no better place than X to share and debate deeply technical analysis. Particularly on emerging topics like Orbital data centers. X | xAI team have put a lot of effort into making sure these niche interest conversations make it to the right audience. The trending topic below is clearly only trending for microcosm of the total X audience. This was not a thing just 12 months ago. The integration of Grok into X is adding value and encouraging more and better discourse. This will pay dividends for xAI that may not be obvious for a few years, but it will. Grok does a good job of presenting a balanced narrative, as it should. Trending link:xcancel.com/i/trending/20245018166â€¦

item.description: ğ• Algorithm doesn't make people conservative It de-programmed them and makes them resistant to propaganda When you stop filtering reality through legacy media and start reading primary sources - receipts, raw footage, actual data - your worldview shifts I call that people waking up

item.title: @elonmusk: Why are zero women in the top 10 chess players ever? Why are ~95% of inventors, founders, and Nobel ...
item.description: Why are zero women in the top 10 chess players ever? Why are ~95% of inventors, founders, and Nobel Prize winners men? Why are ~90% of prisoners and ~75% of homeless men? Same reason: men have greater variability in everything - IQ, aggression, risk appetite, ambition, trust, occupational interest, etc. Chart:@DavidMaywald
